title: Minimize Option Capacity Violations
natural_language: Transform the strict option capacity constraint into a soft constraint and minimize the total number of capacity violations across all options and positions.
expected_change: Introduce binary violation variables viol[o,s] that relax the capacity constraint and add a new objective minimizing the sum of all viol[o,s].
evaluation_goal: Verify that violation variables exist and the solver objective minimizes total violations while keeping other constraints unchanged.
